query: create table if not exists Bestellung (idBestellung int not null primary key AUTO_INCREMENT, Tisch_idTisch int);
create table if not exists Tisch (idTisch int not null primary key AUTO_INCREMENT, Number int);
create table if not exists Essen (idEssen int not null primary key AUTO_INCREMENT, depleted boolean, category varchar(32), Name varchar(32), pictureName varchar(32), price float);
create table if not exists Trinken (idTrinken int not null primary key AUTO_INCREMENT, depleted boolean, category varchar(32), Name varchar(32), pictureName varchar(32), price float);

create table if not exists BestellungTrinken (Bestellung_idBestellung int, Trinken_idTrinken int, Stueck int, finished boolean, served boolean, timePlaced varchar(25), timeFinished varchar(25),timeServed varchar(25));

create table if not exists BestellungEssen (Bestellung_idBestellung int, Essen_idEssen int, Stueck int, finished boolean, served boolean, timePlaced varchar(25), timeFinished varchar(25),timeServed varchar(25));
